sentences.english: So Andy tried again the next day, and the next.

sentences.english: Babies that are 6 month old can be fed with rice porridge or congee containing bird's nest.

sentences.english: She fed him only the very best rice and rice porridge.

sentences.english: We serve only soy-bean milk or rice gruel, no coffee and fruit juice.
